text: We use your data to provide and improve the Service.

The application stores an access token on your Mac, which allows it to upload video content to the Meta platform.
The applications store an access token which allow them to upload content to the YouTube website.
The application stores your name, and an access token which allows it to upload content to the LinkedIn website.
Google may use the collected data to contextualize and personalize the ads of its own advertising network.
Ecamm Network, LLC uses the collected data for various purposes:
While using our Service, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you ("Personal Data").

That information is provided directly to our third-party payment processors whose use of your personal information is governed by their Privacy Policy.
We will not store or collect your payment card details.

The Ecamm Live Service may access or process, but not store , the following Facebook and Instagram Platform Data for the purposes of live stream production: The title, post description, permalink, and date of scheduled live streams.

Google uses the data collected to track and monitor the use of our Service.
This data is shared with other Google services.
Ecamm Network, LLC ("us", "we", or "our") operates the ecamm.com website (the "Service").

The Ecamm Live Service may access, process, or store the following Facebook and Instagram Platform Data for the purposes of live stream production: The date, time, and Facebook Group name associated with your most recent live streams.
The Ecamm Live Service may collect Facebook and Instagram Platform Data consistent with providing live streaming services.
We may also collect information how the Service is accessed and used ("Usage Data").
The Ecamm Live application may access a list of your scheduled live broadcasts for display purpose.

The Ecamm Live Service may access or process, but not store , the following Facebook and Instagram Platform Data for the purposes of live stream production: The title, post description, permalink, and date of scheduled live streams.
The application stores your name, and an access token which allows it to upload content to the LinkedIn website.
These third parties have access to your Personal Data only to perform these tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose.

Ecamm Network, LLC may process your Personal Data because:
Ecamm Network, LLC will retain your Personal Data only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy.
Under certain circumstances, Ecamm Network, LLC may be required to disclose your Personal Data if required to do so by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities (e.g. a court or a government agency).

If you are located outside United States and choose to provide information to us, please note that we transfer the data, including Personal Data, to United States and process it there.
We may use your Personal Data to contact you with newsletters, marketing or promotional materials and other information that may be of interest to you.
We will retain and use your Personal Data to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations (for example, if we are required to retain your data to comply with applicable laws), resolve disputes, and enforce our legal agreements and policies.
